
```{r}
#| label: load-packages

library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
```


```{r}
#| label: load-data

load("~/sta470case1/data/yeast.RData")
yeast <- y
```

```{r}
#| label: nnn-dist

yeast |> ggplot(aes(x = nNN50)) +
  geom_histogram() +
  facet_wrap(~ uniqueWell)
```

```{r}
#| label: pca-area-concavity

pca_results <- prcomp(yeast |> filter(uniqueWell == "C-03") |> select(AreaShape_Area, AreaShape_Perimeter), scale = TRUE)

pca_scores <- data.frame(pca_results$x) |> summarize(PC1 = mean(PC1), PC2 = mean(PC2))
```
